::Feline::

She looked at HotRod with tears starting to well up in her eyes.
She gave his hand a light squeeze. "I..I.." she closed her eyes and 
let the tears roll down her face.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He was startled by her reaction.
> "Whithout... what?", he asked. He took her hand.
> "It's ok."
